title: Hello i want to download league of legend on my new computer but what is the size of lol.
body: Hello i want to download league of legend on my new computer but what is the size of lol. Can you help me?

replies.body: Per the current[ minimum system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements), league currently needs 12 GB of available space.  You can download league [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)!  Hopefully that's enough space!
